boons.name: Brutal Strength
boons.colour: A crimson glow shadows the boon. You feel a heavy presence swelling around you.
boons.stat: Gain +10 damage on your normal attacks.

boons.name: Exposed
boons.colour: A crimson glow shadows the boon. You feel a heavy presence swelling around you.
boons.stat: Convert 100% of your defence into attack.

boons.name: Killing Blow
boons.colour: A crimson glow shadows the boon. You feel a heavy presence swelling around you.
boons.stat: Enemies left below 5% hp after an attack are automatically executed.

boons.name: Hunter's Eye
boons.colour: A green light glimmers at the appearance of the boon. You feel as though someone is watching over you.
boons.stat: Gain +5 attack priority on all weapons. If your weapon is a bow, gain +5 damage on your normal and special attacks.

boons.name: Precision Strike
boons.colour: A green light glimmers at the appearance of the boon. You feel as though someone is watching over you.
boons.stat: Gain a 10% chance to deal double damage on your normal and special attacks.

boons.name: First Strike
boons.colour: A green light glimmers at the appearance of the boon. You feel as though someone is watching over you.
boons.stat: If you strike an enemy first, your attack will deal double damage.

boons.name: Reciprocation
boons.colour: A rosy ambience warms the room. You can feel the love and passion from here.
boons.stat: When attacked, there is a 44% chance to redirect 50% of damage taken to the attacker.

boons.name: Charm
boons.colour: A rosy ambience warms the room. You can feel the love and passion from here.
boons.stat: After using your special attack, there is a 14% chance to stun the target for one turn.

boons.name: Go Easy on Me
boons.colour: A rosy ambience warms the room. You can feel the love and passion from here.
boons.stat: Enemies deal 10% less damage to you.

boons.name: Smite
boons.colour: A golden glow fills the room. You hear the crackle of lighting followed by a thunderous shout.
boons.stat: If you were to take lethal damage, execute the enemy who delivered the attack. If the enemy is a boss (excluding minibosses), it deals 10% max hp damage instead.

boons.name: Thundering Fury
boons.colour: A golden glow fills the room. You hear the crackle of lighting followed by a thunderous shout.
boons.stat: Once you lose attack priority, halve the defence of the target you just attacked.

boons.name: Stormbreaker
boons.colour: A golden glow fills the room. You hear the crackle of lighting followed by a thunderous shout.
boons.stat: Your attacks bounce to one other target, dealing 75% of the initial attack's damage.

boons.name: Sucky Wucky
boons.colour: A calming blue is emitted from the boon. You feel at ease.
boons.stat: 5% of all damage dealt is restored as health.

boons.name: Vitality
boons.colour: A calming blue is emitted from the boon. You feel at ease.
boons.stat: After clearing a room, restore +5 hp. If your hp is maxed out, gain +2 max hp instead.

boons.name: High Tide
boons.colour: A calming blue is emitted from the boon. You feel at ease.
boons.stat: Recieve 3 fish that each heal 10hp.

boons.name: Fortify
boons.colour: A lustrous yellow clashes with the darkened shadow of a navy blue. Your will to protect grows stronger.
boons.stat: Gain +25 defence. If your weapon is a shield, this effect is doubled.

boons.name: Divine Protection
boons.colour: A lustrous yellow clashes with the darkened shadow of a navy blue. Your will to protect grows stronger.
boons.stat: Gain a 4% chance to completely block the next instance of damage.

boons.name: Stand Your Ground
boons.colour: A lustrous yellow clashes with the darkened shadow of a navy blue. Your will to protect grows stronger.
boons.stat: Damage that would otherwise be lethal reduces your hp to 1.

boons.name: Berserker
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you. The boon seems to be a void of sorts.
boons.stat: Reduce your max hp to 10, but you gain a 500% damage bonus.

boons.name: Call to Arms
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you. The boon seems to be a void of sorts.
boons.stat: You can switch your weapon.

boons.name: Sheath
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you. The boon seems to be a void of sorts.
boons.stat: You gain +25 attack priority but deal 75% reduced damage.

boons.name: Playing with Fire
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you. The boon seems to be a void of sorts.
boons.stat: Switches your special attack to a bomb that deals 25% of an enemy's max hp. If you don't use the bomb within 4 rooms, well... you don't want to find out.

boons.name: Satanic Ritual
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you. The boon seems to be a void of sorts.
boons.stat: Once per room, using your special attack begins a ritual. Immediately after casting, you lose attack priority for the next 4 turns. Once the ritual is complete, damage an enemy for 99% of their current hp.

boons.name: Thou Knoweth Not Weakness
boons.colour: A cold aura swallows you. The boon seems to be a void of sorts.
boons.stat: For the next 3 rooms, lose -50% of your attack. Afterwards, gain +25% of your original attack.
